title: Jo Stevens – 2021 Comments on Boris Johnson Meeting with Ed Woodward
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jo Stevens, the Shadow Digital, Culture, Media and Sport Secretary, on 22 April 2021.
content:
The Prime Minister and his ministers made very public and vocal condemnation of the European Super League. The public would therefore expect the same message to have been delivered in any private meetings.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance

  *[SEND]: special educational needs and/or disabilities

  *[

Downing Street should release the minutes in order to clear up any confusion and avoid accusations of hypocrisy.
